Articles.Content:
When I downloaded the new KSP 1.11 update, I was very exited. But when I launched KSP and got a Kerbal on EVA, there was no option for EVA construction mode. I tried pressing "I" (the keyboard shortcut), but it did nothing. Am I doing something wrong?

 

Mods Installed: Kerbal Engineer Redux; Bettertimewarp

Sorry, I made the stupid mistake of using a pilot to (try) weld, instead of an engineer  

Edited December 18, 2020 by KerbalKiller2000
Dumb Mistake
Was the kerbal you sent out an engineer?
